item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurants and events in Providence.

This week's location is: Julian's on Broadway over on the West Side!

This is a well-known restaurant over on the West Side and probably best known for their weekend brunch menu. Its always crowded on the weekend mornings with lines out the door! However, they also do dinner and sport a bevy of interesting beverages of all kinds. There is definitely something for everyone! We'll gather at the bar, but I also understand there is an outdoor space in the back (table service only), and I have it on the QT that the Scrabble group meets there on Monday nights....Sounds like fun! So let's check it out!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a scarf of some kind - I think, but we're hard to miss and very friendly!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Julian's!
